title: Rod pulled to right on frictionless U-shaped rail

content.question: A conducting rod of resistance R is in electrical contact with a frictionless U-shaped rail of width L and negligible resistance. The rod is pulled to the right at a constant velocity <math> <mrow> <mover accent="true"> <mi>v</mi> <mo stretchy="true">⇀</mo> </mover> </mrow> </math> . A magnetic field <math> <mrow> <mover accent="true"> <mi>B</mi> <mo stretchy="true">⇀</mo> </mover> </mrow> </math> is directed into the page, as shown in the figure above. Under these conditions, the electric power dissipated in the rod is P. If the velocity of the rod is doubled, the power dissipated in the rod is

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
